results.title: NWIDA | All Wireless & Prepaid Expo 2023
results.content: Virtual Exhibit Hall Book a Meeting Company information: The National Wireless Independent Dealer Association (NWIDA) is the only national association designed explicitly for the wireless dealer. We are here to help the dealer grow their business. Our members receive discounts on the products and services they use every day.
results.raw_content:
No thanks, later
Virtual Exhibit Hall
The National Wireless Independent Dealer Association (NWIDA) is the only national association designed explicitly for the wireless dealer. We are here to help the dealer grow their business.
Our members receive discounts on the products and services they use every day. In addition, our exclusive content includes seminars, webinars and moderated forums where our members can expand their knowledge.
We lend our voice to local and national legislation to help our members and the industry in general. We've paired with other organizations to help pass "Right to Repair" laws - currently in discussion in 17 states.
NWIDA members enjoy:
Discounts:
Our wireless dealer members receive discounts on the products and services used and needed every day. Payroll processing, Human Resources, Benefits, Marketing, Business Phone systems, Signage and much, much more.
Knowledge:
Learn more, earn more. As a NWIDA member, you have access to our Board of Advisers and Directors. Ask questions of other members in our moderated forum. Join our seminars and webinars and get the answers you seek.
Industry Voice:
By joining with other organizations like Repair.org, we reach out to legislators across the country supporting Right-to-Repair and other important causes that impact your businesses. Together, NWIDA adds a strong voice, making sure your voices are heard.
THE LIST:
We don’t sell phones, parts or accessories. However, you can find those on THE LIST – our growing and comprehensive listing and rating guide to phones, parts and accessory suppliers – as well as Master Agents. It’s free to use and anyone can search and read THE LIST but only our members can rate and rank the businesses.
NWIDA
Adam Wolf
President
2A Buckingham Rd
PH: 9196943298
www.nwida.org
Send email
